name: Hex Evil Lost Level
description:
Oh dear, you wanted to played this hexed game? I wouldn't recommend it, since there are curses in the game that makes the game unbearable. Understand this game is hexed. There is no way to escape or quit the game. If you really wanted to restart the game, you can refresh your browser.

I do want to help you succeed, despite it being pointless. The controls are LEFT ARROW, RIGHT ARROW, UP ARROW, and DOWN ARROW (using Godot defaults controls, so it should allow for a gamepad in theory). SPACEBAR or ENTER will allow to continue any dialogue you encounter.

The music and sound effects were too much for humankind, so I banned those from this game (really, I ran out of time to add them in).  I used Faustain Bargain and Crumbling location wildcards.

Credits:

Coding - seamless

Sprite Art - from Anokolisa in Itch.io

Dialogue background - did a google search for creative commons right background. Didn't save the link, so cannot credit it correctly.

Font - peaberry-pixel-font from emhuo in Itch.io

Anything else - from seamless
